Address.label: Address
Address.value: 254 MUNOZ RIVERA AVENUE, SAN JUAN, 918, Puerto Rico

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: OFG Bancorp is a financial holding company, through its subsidiaries provides banking and financial services. It operates through three segments namely Banking, Wealth Management, and Treasury. It serves to clients such as commercial, consumer, auto, and mortgage lending, checking and savings accounts, financial planning, insurance, financial services, and investment brokerage, and corporate and individual trust and retirement services. It provides services in the region of Puerto Rico.
